centerName: Department of Plant Sciences, University of Cambridge
title: UVM4::pAS_R1
description: C. reinhardtii strain UVM4 (Neupert et al.. 2011) transformed with plasmid pAS_R1 containing a paromomycin resistance gene (aphVIII) under control of PMETE.
